headline: Madison Sustainable Equity Fund Q4 2024 Investment Strategy Letter
summary: The S&P 500 ended 2024 with a 25% gain for the year. This marks the second consecutive year of gains exceeding 25% and the third such occurrence in the past four years.

raw.headline: Madison Sustainable Equity Fund Q4 2024 Investment Strategy Letter

headline: Danaher Announces Appointment of Charles Lamanna to Danaher Board
summary: Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR) announced today that it has appointed Charles Lamanna to its Board of Directors and to the Board's Science & Technology Committee.

raw.headline: Danaher Announces Appointment of Charles Lamanna to Danaher Board
raw.summary: Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR) announced today that it has appointed Charles Lamanna to its Board of Directors and to the Board's Science & Technology Committee.

headline: Danaher Increases Quarterly Dividend
summary: Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR) announced today that its Board of Directors has approved a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.32 per share of its common stock, payable on April 25, 2025 to holders of record on March 28, 2025. This reflects an 18.5% increase over the previous dividend payment of $0.27.

headline: Madison Investors Fund Q4 2024 Investment Strategy Letter
summary: The Madison Investors Fund (class I) decreased 0.4% in the fourth quarter of 2024, compared to the 2.4% increase in the S&P 500 Index. Read more here.
